sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>thread</radical>s have to <radical>suit</radical> you if you want a good <kanji>salary</kanji>. No one is going to give you a salary if your clothes don't suit you. You have to look professional!
meaningInfo: When you see someone wearing a fancy suit that suits them, don't you wonder about how much their salary is?
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>salary</kanji> is paid in <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (<ja>きゅう</ja>). Maybe you shouldn't have worn that cucumber tie when you interviewed for this job, even though it suited you well.
readingInfo: Imagine your salary being paid in cucumbers. Open that sweet paycheck and watch the cucumbers come tumbling out.
